episodes.title: The Doctor, the Widow and the Wardrobe
episodes.plot: It's Christmas Eve, 1938, when Madge Arwell comes to the aid of an injured Spaceman Angel as she cycles home. He promises to repay her kindness - all she has to do is make a wish. Three years later, a devastated Madge escapes war-torn London with her two children for a dilapidated house in Dorset. She is crippled with grief at the news her husband has been lost over the channel, but determined to give Lily and Cyril the best Christmas ever. The Arwells are surprised to be greeted by a madcap caretaker whose mysterious Christmas gift leads them into a magical wintry ...

episodes.title: Asylum of the Daleks
episodes.plot: Amy, Rory and the Doctor are reunited when they are kidnapped by the Daleks, who send them on a mission to destroy the most horrifying place in the universe- the asylum of the Daleks.

episodes.title: Dinosaurs on a Spaceship
episodes.plot: The doctor gathers some of his old friends to help him investigate an unmanned spaceship on a crash course to earth that when it collides, will destroy it, they soon discover the ship's precious and dangerous cargo- dinosaurs.

episodes.title: A Town Called Mercy
episodes.plot: The Doctor gets a Stetson (and a gun), and finds himself the reluctant Sheriff of a Western town under siege by a relentless cyborg who goes by the name of The Gunslinger. But who is he and what does he want?

episodes.title: The Power of Three
episodes.plot: Earth is suddenly visited by millions of small black cubes of unknown origin. The Doctor joins Amy, Rory and Rory's father, Brian, to help discover what these cubes bring for humanity.

episodes.title: The Angels Take Manhattan
episodes.plot: After Rory has an encounter with a weeping angel, the doctor and Amy travel to 1930's New York to save him, but they soon discover that the weeping angels have taken over Manhattan, and soon, maybe, the world.

episodes.title: The Snowmen
episodes.plot: London, 1892. Snow is evolving, turning into icy monstrosities, but this is no concern for the Doctor who has given up trying to save the universe, leaving it to a clever young governess named Clara to save the day.

episodes.title: The Bells of Saint John
episodes.plot: The doctor finds Clara in present day, where they work together to solve the mystery of people disappearing which as it turns out, has a sinister link to WiFi.

episodes.title: The Rings of Akhaten
episodes.plot: The doctor takes Clara to the rings of Akheten, A partly destroyed planet, where a religious ceremony is about to be carried out, but a darkness is stirring, a hungry darkness that could consume the rings of Akhetan and the universe.

episodes.title: Cold War
episodes.plot: The doctor and Clara find themselves on a Russian cold war submarine that is falling to the bottom of the ocean because of an attack by a rogue Martian warrior, that 's still aboard.

episodes.title: Hide
episodes.plot: The Doctor and Clara arrive at a supposedly haunted mansion where they find a ghost hunter and a psychic who are on the search for a legendary ghost known as 'the witch of the well'

episodes.title: Journey to the Centre of the TARDIS
episodes.plot: After the TARDIS is caught accidentally by an outer space trash collector, Clara is trapped deep inside of it where she finds herself on a journey through the doctor's past and her future.

episodes.title: The Crimson Horror
episodes.plot: When they find a picture of the Doctor in a recently dead man's eye, it's up to Madame Vastra, Jenny and Strax to save The Doctor and find out what sinister secrets are going on at Sweetsville, Yorkshire.

episodes.title: Nightmare in Silver
episodes.plot: The Doctor takes Clara and the children she babysits to a rundown amusement park in space where Cybermen are hiding, and ready to invade the most precious place in the universe, The Doctor's mind.

episodes.title: The Name of the Doctor
episodes.plot: The Doctor's friends are being kidnapped, which leads him to the fields of Trenzalore, where his greatest secret will be revealed and Clara's mystery will be solved.
